conbody.p: PollingPolling is a mode for polling the students or conducting a quick and simple multiple choice pop quiz without envoking the full quiz system (_fixme_ [xref]).
Press the Interact button and select Poll _fixme_ (?) [ui] from the class (see ) or group (see ) menu to to initiate polling group of students or the whole class.
Poll management window ( ) will appear on your screen.

row.entry: Start/Stop button to start and stop polling.
Question panel for specifying the poll question.
Save the poll for future use _fixme_ [rus].
Выпадающий список для выбора вариантов ответов на вопрос голосования или опроса из числа предопределенных вариантов ответа.
Start a new poll _fixme_ [ui] with default settings .

conbody.p: To create a new poll: enter your question in the field (3), add answer options as necessary using buttons (12), and optionally select one of the options from the drop down list (10) to designate one of the answer options as the correct one (for pop quizzes). You can save the poll for future reuse with the help of the button (4) ( ). You can also open a previously saved poll using button (5).

Press the Start button to initiate polling (at this point it will be replaced by a Stop button). A polling window ( ) will appear on the student screens. The students make their selections and press Send. Results tab in the poll management window ( ) will be autoselected on the teacher workstation.
conbody.note: Please note that title of the group(s) where you are conducting the poll will be dispalyed in red for the duration of the poll.
conbody.p: You can monitor the poll in real time in the Progress _fixme_ [ui] tab ( ). Poll results are represented as a histogram bar chart with each bin corresponding to every answer option. The chart is updated as soon as results arrive. Progress bar below the bar chart indicates fraction of the students who have already responded to the poll. You can press the Stop button at any time to terminate the poll.

You can view detailed results of the poll in the Results tab ( ) that will be autoselected either when you terminate the poll by pressing the Stop button or the poll finishes when all the students have responded. This tab contains a detailed list of responces to the poll:

ol.li: indication whether selected option is correct if the poll had one designated

conbody.p: You can generate a report of the poll results in HTML format, convenient for viowing, printing, and posting online. Press the Generate report _fixme_ [ui] button, specify report file name, and press Save. You will be prompted if you would like to view the report. The report ( ) will be opened in a new window of your default web browser (usually Microsoft Internet Explorer).
